trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for lengths of <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisBreak" name="EmphasisBreak" href=""></xref> between spoken words.
trans-unit.target: Nummererer verdier for lengde på <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisBreak" name="EmphasisBreak" href=""> </xref> mellom ordene.

trans-unit.source: The break emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: Break-utheving er angitt for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>forekomster gjennom <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>egenskap i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objektet som ble returnert av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>egenskapen til en forekomst av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render breaks between words; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: Hver syntetiske-motor er fri til å finne ut hvordan du gjengi sideskift mellom ordene. typen utheving er forskjellig språk, med tabeller, genders eller stemmer.

trans-unit.source: Both EmphasisBreak and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: Begge EmphasisBreak og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>kan brukes når innstillingen eller henting av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>på en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of EmphasisBreak are all less than zero and values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> are greater than or equal to zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: De to verdiene kan være forskjellig faktum at de faktiske verdiene for EmphasisBreak alle er mindre enn null og verdier av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>er større enn eller lik null; og ved å bruke verdien for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>returnert av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objektet som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>egenskapen på en forekomst.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>

Mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>
